section.title: New and Noteworthy in KIE Workbench 6.5.0
Guided Rule Editor : Support formulae in composite field constraints
section.para: Composite field constraints now support use of formulae.
When adding constraints to a Pattern the "Multiple Field Constraint" selection ("All of (and)" and "Any of (or)") supports use of formulae in addition to expressions.

section.title: Authoring - Project Editor - Reimport button
section.para: The "Reimport" button invalidates all cached dependencies, in order to handle scenarios where a specific dependency was updated without having its version modified.
